backend/main.mo: Motoko canister storing customization requests with submit, fetch, and timestamp-sorted retrieval functions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature-to-file mapping report describing implemented frontend features and their associated components and tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend files detailing their purpose and functionality.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind setup defining global OKLCH color variables for light/dark modes and applying base styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading fonts and mounting the React application root.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router with routes for Home, Gallery, Customize, and Contact inside a shared Layout.
frontend/src/components/DesignSelect.tsx: Dropdown component listing invitation designs for selection during customization.
frontend/src/components/InvitationPrevie: Dialog showing a full-size invitation preview with buttons to customize or close.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Global layout with header navigation, mobile menu, main content slot, and branded footer.
frontend/src/components/SubmissionStatus: Alert component displaying success or error messages after form submissions.
frontend/src/data/invitations.ts: Static array describing eight invitation designs with IDs, names, styles, and images.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and refreshing the backend actor based on Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, exposing identity state, login, logout, and status helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks to submit customization requests and fetch all stored requests from the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining base styles, theme variables, and typography for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Entrypoint that renders the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Renders a contact information page with designer details, phone number, and availability.
frontend/src/pages/CustomizePage.tsx: Provides a form for users to submit wedding invitation customization details via a backend mutation.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Displays a grid of invitation designs and opens a preview dialog when a design is selected.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page showing hero content and navigation to gallery and customization flows.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata including versioning, feature list, image requirements, and a summary of the wedding invitation website scope.
